title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs with parmesan, salt, and pepper.
Drain pasta, then quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Cook onion until golden, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
